description:
This course is for those who are looking to increase their website conversions and increase their sales / sign-ups by seeing what visitors do on landing pages

This course will teach you

  • Create heatmaps and record your website visitors
  • Learn from them and optimize website
  • Create funnels, surveys, polls and ask users to test your website

Anyone having a website is welcome to take this course, and I promise you this structured course will help you improve your landing page UX and increase conversions.

However, nothing happens till you take action. So, take action today, take this course, start applying what you learn and take your marketing to the next level!
title: Improve your landing page with Heatmaps & Visitor Recordings
